page.title: 04UNEMPLOYMENT.
page.content: {Unemployment}is a problem in our area.There are{33%}of adults without a job.They have to sign on the dole.They have to report to their local social security office every two weeks to sign their name.They are then given money by the government so they can live.A single adult gets{Â£25.75}and they can get their rent paid and money for clothes and furniture. The reason why there are so many {unemployed}in{Bootle}is because there is not enough work.People have left their jobs because factories have closed down and they became redundant. Many factories and the docks too are using machines to do the work instead of men.People who are on the dole get fed up and depressed because they can't work.They get bored because they have nothing to do.{(Ellen Denholm.)}
